English (United States)(en-US):
Will move towards the player when there is a player nearby
There are more of them, and they will jump quickly when they encounter the terrain group.
Will attack players when close to them
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN):
附近有玩家时会朝向玩家移动
数量较多，碰到地形组当时会快速的跳跃
靠近玩家时会对玩家造成攻击

English (United States)(en-US): Items that drop from monsters, boxes, etc.
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 会从怪物、箱子之类的地方掉落的道具

English (United States)(en-US): A barrage that looks like Apple, used for testing
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 长得和苹果一样的弹幕，测试使用
